title: PC to use in college
content: Are there any libraries or labs that allow students to use the PC for studying purposes?

comments.body: (I'm a fresher and didn't buy a laptop yet)

I guess you can use the ones in the labs I’m not sure I’ve never used it in 3 years of my college life 
I’d recommend you get a laptop for yourself which would be helpful and convenient throughout your engineering course
You can use the ones in GJB Library
They don't let u use the pcs mostly from lab....but since ur first year they probably will

The lab PCs are for lab use only.

There are a few PCs for students to use available in the GJB library.
Okayy thankyou for letting me know
